result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James E Smith

records.addlTxt:
Defendant James E Smith appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Sopcic was just appointed to the case and does not have discovery or an offer.  Case is adjourned to 11-7-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant James E Smith appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status of counsel. Defendant does not qualify for appointment of an attorney. Defendant was to hire an attorney.  Court is adjourned to 10-10-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant James E Smith in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status of Counsel. Matter held via Zoom video conference and streamed through DAcast. Defendant informs the court that he has yet to retain private counsel, as he was under the impression that he would still be eligible for a public defender. Court further advises the defendant that the sole purpose of today's hearing was to confirm obtainment of counsel, and that he is to continue seeking counsel through various inquiries. Court sets next court date for an additional Status of Counsel date. Case adjourned to Br 10.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant James E Smith in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE ON DACAST.  Case in court for pretrial conference.  Defendant appears without counsel.  Court rescheduled matter for status of counsel.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616.  Case adjourned to Branch 10.  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with A.B.N
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

ADDRESS INFO for James E Smith
Current: 8027 W Custer Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53218   (Effective: 06-29-2022)
Prior: 233 North 38th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208

Defendant James E Smith in court with attorney Colin Patrick McGinn.  Defendant James E Smith in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty. Defendant IS NOT Public Defender eligible. 
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
